translations: n.[图情][计] 目录，手册（catalog 复数）

sentences.sentence: Now, thousands of mailshots, catalogues and sales pitches go straight into the bin.
sentences.translation: 现在，数千的邮寄广告、商家目录和促销传单直接就进了垃圾桶。

sentences.sentence: She wrote off for some catalogues.
Internet links will provide access to the card catalogues of all the major libraries in the world by 2005.
sentences.translation: 到2005年，互联网将提供可查阅世界上所有主要图书馆的卡片目录途径。
